name: SQUISHBALL: CHOCOLATE WARS
description:
Chocolate Gnomes are coming to steal the delicious milky chocolate from the peace loving rabbits living in RabbitLand. Your role is to squish them all with your giant magical 'squish ball'. (Kind of a bit like that 80's classic 'Break Out' but way squishier!)

A game made entirely out of chocolate and sugar

Endless waves of chocolate gnomes to squish

Puzzling and ingenious chocolatey levels

Loads of spell cards to collect and use

Family-Safe fun (with a sense of humour)

Zero calories
